conbody.p: The XSLT-Conref use cases are stored in the folder org.dita-semia.resolver/samples/xslt-conref.

Adjust the following settings to use XSLT-Conref in your own DITA topics:
Include these XML declarations :<?xml-model href="urn:dita-semia:xslt-conref:schema:xslt-conref-topic.rng" schematypens="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"?> <?xml-model href="urn:dita-semia:xslt-conref:schema:xslt-conref-topic.rng" schematypens="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"?>In the href attribute values, replace the word "topic" by "reference" if you work in a reference topic. Concept and task topics are not supported.Is that correct?
Insert the following namespace declarations in your root element:xmlns:xcr = "http://www.dita-semia.org/xslt-conref" xmlns:xcrcp = "http://www.dita-semia.org/xslt-conref/custom-parameter"
